Title: Enacts the "health insurance preauthorization disclosure act"
Summary: Enacts the "health insurance preauthorization disclosure act"; requires health insurance companies to provide participating health care providers with a list of health care treatments and services that require preauthorization from the health insurance company.
LawCode: Add §§4242 & 4905-a, Ins L; add §4905-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to enacting the "health insurance preauthorization disclosure act"
